text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @GovMurphy @realDonaldTrump Real danger when IBM fires US Citizens during Covid19 in favour of low paying Costa Rica employees to service US based customers like Macy's! Stop H1B visas as well as backdoor employees of Costa Rica & Canada that service US clients!
US Citizens are out of jobs!
